alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Polk (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 5:01PM CDT until September 04 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Polk County in western Arkansas... Southwestern Montgomery County in western Arkansas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 501 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Little Missouri Falls Recreation Area, or 14 miles northeast of Umpire, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Missouri Falls Recreatio... Big Fork... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
